name: Get Fucking Wrekced
description:
Welcome to get fucking wrekced. This is the ultimate story/meme game ever created. This game is heavily revolved around today's picture on loads of subjects. This game contains very explicit language and humor, if you’re Light hearted and easily offended this is not your game. You may even ask yourself why would I want to play this game? Even though the game contains darker comedy and explicit language if you can bypass that the games simply fun. It has countless of very cool and interesting characters and places with a lot of lore left for interpretation. There is also a much bigger drive for combat in this game, it’s not revolves around “this weapon has a higher attack so it’s better.” Weapons and equipment often times have special affects that make them more viable in certain situations then other, along with effects there are elemental weapons that do more damage to specific enemies, there is much more strategy involved when it comes to combat in this game. Hopefully you’ll get immersed as you talk to interesting people and creatures, find new companions and find newer exciting weapons and equipment.

This game is very challenging, and contains loads of secrets and easter eggs, if you find them I'll be very pleased and impressed with the attention to detail you have. I'm open for discussion about the game, I want it to continue to get better as time moves on. Feel free to leave your honest opinions on the game and myself. Thank you if you've read this far, now get fucking wrekced casual.
